title: Accessing the synthesis of natural products and their analogues enabled by the Barbier reaction: a review
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33536-33567
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05646A, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aqsa Mushtaq, Ameer Fawad Zahoor, Mirza Nadeem Ahmad, Samreen Gul Khan, Naheed Akhter, Usman Nazeer, Asim Mansha, Hamad Ahmad, Aijaz Rasool Chaudhry, Ahmad Irfan
The latest utilization of the Barbier reaction and its variants towards the procurement of diverse natural products i.e., alkaloids, terpenoids, lactones and lignans etc. has been summarized in this review article.
